name: Mastiff

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The mastiff has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the mastiff's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

notes: Loyal canines often used as guard dogs or hunting companions. Their pack tactics make them dangerous in groups.
description: A medium-sized canine with strong jaws and keen senses, often found guarding settlements or accompanying hunters.
